answers.answer: Call your Dr. Swelling in feet and legs are normal, but not in the face. Your blood pressure could be up and it can be preeclampsia. Better to be safe than sorry.
I've bn sitting  down past hour  & swelling  has gone  down  slightly hoping  was just  rest needed xx

question: I have  been  quite  busy  last few days  as it's my son's b day but today  my feet, ankles, hands & slightly  on face have  excess swelling, I feel weak but think it's exhaustion any help on what I should do? Thanks x
title: swelling
